Headline: Trains bypassing Thorndale Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Thorndale due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Thorndale due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
